name: Radiant Moonfly
desc:
The moon's ancient power has seeped into these illusory wings, and the butterfly-shaped monster now dances lightly in the moonlight.
The principles of evolution state that after the wild yet primeval power was tamed by the heavenly ruler, such a monster should not be able to maintain its shape, becoming smaller and weaker over time. However, the moon's blessing has allowed it to glide through this world while remaining in its prime, displaying the remnants of an older world, when the ancient moon once illuminated the land.

customize.text: The strongest species of radiant beasts, whose "Radiant Cocoon" display more obvious effects. Quickly <color=#ffe14b>heal your HP to its maximum</color> to escape from a Radiant Cocoon. Radiant beasts possess many mysterious characteristics — rumors even circle that they can change their Elemental Type under the right conditions...

<color=#ffd780>Radiant Cocoon</color>
Heal your characters and remove the Radiant Cocoon.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Golden Autumn</color>
Defeat a Radiant Moonfly in Co-Op Mode.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

dropMaterial.name: Mora
dropMaterial.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

dropMaterial.name: Companionship EXP
dropMaterial.desc: Companionship EXP. Used to increase Friendship levels.

dropMaterial.name: Lightbearing Scale-Feather
dropMaterial.desc:
The scaly wings shed by a defeated Radiant Moonfly.
In many local folk tales, those who enter the forbidden ground are frequently bewitched by these wings and never seen again. Some say this is because the moon, whose illusory magic these butterfly-shaped monsters have harnessed, is prone to inducing madness, while others take it as a warning of the inconstancy and danger of ancient power...

dropMaterial.name: Nagadus Emerald Fragment
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension Material.

"I had a very, very long dream..."

dropMaterial.name: Nagadus Emerald Chunk
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension Material.

"I had a very, very long dream..."

"In it, people were holding hands, dancing in a circle, be they sages or fools, dancers or warriors, puppets or statues of gods..."

dropMaterial.name: Nagadus Emerald Gemstone
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension Material.

"I had a very, very long dream..."

"In it, people were holding hands, dancing in a circle, be they sages or fools, dancers or warriors, puppets or statues of gods..."

"That dancing circle embodied everything about the universe. Life has always been the end, while it is wisdom that shall be the means."

dropMaterial.name: Agnidus Agate Fragment
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"A pilgrimage for a wish; a battle to earn a name..."

dropMaterial.name: Agnidus Agate Chunk
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"A pilgrimage for a wish; a battle to earn a name...
Burnt to cinders for a dream."

dropMaterial.name: Agnidus Agate Gemstone
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"A pilgrimage for a wish; a battle to earn a name...
Burnt to cinders for a dream.
If the intention yet remains, achieved ██'s truth he has."
